# --description-- Give your `.label` selector a `margin` property set to `20px auto`, and a `padding` property set to `0 7px`. # --hints-- Your `.label` selector should have a `margin` property set to `20px auto`. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('.label')?.margin === '20px auto'); ``` Your `.label` selector should have a `padding` property set to `0 7px`. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('.label')?.padding === '0px 7px'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Nutrition Label

Nutrition Facts

8 servings per container

Serving size 2/3 cup (55g)

``` ```css html { font-size: 16px; } body { font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; } --fcc-editable-region-- .label { border: 2px solid black; width: 270px; } --fcc-editable-region-- ```
